9b78d5ef-1da3-468a-a770-8d58e4df6892.description: Dive into the exciting world of LEDOX365 with our engaging Business User Training! Master the skills of this powerful platform as you learn to navigate, operate and manage contracts. This learning trail will equip you with the skills to author and edit contracts like a pro, streamline business workflows, and effortlessly glide through negotiations, approvals, and signatures. Unleash the full potential of LEDOX365 and Office365 combined for your business.
9b78d5ef-1da3-468a-a770-8d58e4df6892.name: LEDOX365 - Practictioner

issuer.summary: issued by LEDOX365 by Join GmbH

badge_template_activities.title: Discover the secrets to success with our inspiring and well-structured Business Expert Training Webinar! Designed for business users, this interactive session will guide you through the plattform, empowering you with the knowledge and confidence for LEDOX365 and the Office365 world. Our seasoned experts will share invaluable insights, tips, and best practices in a lively and engaging format to boost efficiency and better results for the whole business.

02f4b7d9-60fe-4500-90d6-18eb01f352dc.description: This learning trail is designed for LEDOX365 Administrators to show you the configurational and administrational possibilities of the platform. It will teach us how to maintain the organizational, object and configurational details and how to create & maintain templates, clauses and pre- and post-questionnaires. Unleash the full potential of LEDOX365 and Office365 combined for the whole business.
02f4b7d9-60fe-4500-90d6-18eb01f352dc.name: LEDOX365 - Administrator

63365baf-b4bd-4232-9311-3477298734b3.description: Experience the transformative power of LEDOX365 together with Office365 in our CLM Consultant Training! Elevate your expertise as you uncover LEDOX365's impressive benefits, compelling use cases, and boundless opportunities not only for the legal department. Learn about the possibilites of migrating, connecting and integrating other systems. This training delivers advanced insights on crafting contracts, streamlining workflows, and mastering negotiations, approvals, and signatures and analytics.
63365baf-b4bd-4232-9311-3477298734b3.name: LEDOX365 - CLM Consultant

3837b46f-3a84-4dc5-949f-56011e7cbd02.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of LEDOX365 with our dynamic LEDOX365 Professional Training! Elevate your skills in this platform as you explore its features and how to effortlessly manage contracts. This learning experience will provide you with advanced techniques to craft and revise contracts expertly, optimize business workflows, and seamlessly navigate negotiations, approvals, and signatures. Harness the synergy of LEDOX365 and Office365 to revolutionize your legal operations.
